text.name: bc_enoughMissions
text.text: Your farm already has the maximum number of contracts.

text.name: bc_warnTimeout
text.text: Please complete your %d contract(s) before midnight, to prevent contract penalties.

text.name: bc_warnCancel
text.text: Contract penalty will be at least

text.name: bc_leaseNotEnough
text.text: You need to complete %d more jobs for %s with own equipment, before you can borrow machines.

text.name: bc_maxJobs
text.text: You have reached the maximum discount for %s.

text.name: bc_discValue
text.text: %s grants you %d %% discount for future field purchases.

text.name: bc_rewardMultiplier_tooltip
text.text: Adjust the rewards for contracts offered.

text.name: bc_leaseMultiplier_tooltip
text.text: Adjust the cost for borrowing equipment for contracts.

text.name: bc_maxActive_tooltip
text.text: Max number of concurrently active contracts.

text.name: bc_toDeliver_tooltip
text.text: Percentage of the estimated total yield you must deliver to complete a harvest contract.

text.name: bc_refreshMP_tooltip
text.text: Who can delete / refresh contracts in an MP game.

text.name: bc_debug_tooltip
text.text: Prints info messages to the log if active. Can help to find bugs.

text.name: bc_lazyNPC_tooltip
text.text: If active, NPC farmers more often skip work on their fields. So more contracts can be offered.

text.name: bc_lazyNPCHarvest_tooltip
text.text: If active, NPC farmers do not harvest at all. Could result in a lot of work for you.

text.name: bc_lazyNPCSow_tooltip
text.text: If active, NPC farmers perform sowing work more rarely and offer it as contracts instead.

text.name: bc_lazyNPCPlow_tooltip
text.text: If active, NPC farmers less often plow or cultivate on their own.

text.name: bc_lazyNPCFertilize_tooltip
text.text: If active, NPC farmer perform fertilizing work more rarely and offer it as contracts instead.

text.name: bc_lazyNPCWeed_tooltip
text.text: If active, NPC farmers fight weeds on thier fields more rarely, and instead offer spray and weeding contracts.

text.name: bc_hardMode_tooltip
text.text: If active, all active contracts must be completed by end of month at the latest. Cancelling a contract will cost a penalty. Borrowing contract equipment is only unlocked after completing some jobs.

text.name: bc_hardPenalty_tooltip
text.text: Penalty amount for cancelled contract (in % of contract reward).

text.name: bc_hardLease_tooltip
text.text: Number of successful jobs for an NPC farmer, before they lend you their equipment.

text.name: bc_hardExpire_tooltip
text.text: At the end of what time period all active contracts must be completed.

text.name: bc_discountMode_tooltip
text.text: If active, an NPC farmer give a discount on farmland purchases. Discount increases with the number of completed jobs for this farmer.

text.name: bc_discPerJob_tooltip
text.text: An NPC farmer increases their discount by this amount per job completed. Maximum discount cannot rise above 50%.

text.name: bc_discMaxJobs_tooltip
text.text: Can reduce the max discount, e.g. discount per contract = 11%, number of jobs = 3 -> max discount = 33%. Caution: Current number of jobs complete will decrease by this value on a farmland purchase.
